changeSet.author: mderamos

not.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM listnms l INNER JOIN projectprop p ON l.projectid = p.project_id WHERE p.type_id = 8006 AND p.value=12990 AND l.liststatus!=9 AND l.listtype IN ("NURSERY", "TRIAL", "CHECK");

changeSet.sql: UPDATE listnms l INNER JOIN projectprop p ON l.projectid = p.project_id SET l.liststatus = 9 WHERE p.type_id = 8006 AND p.value=12990 AND l.liststatus!=9 AND l.listtype IN ("NURSERY", "TRIAL", "CHECK");
